db:abstract.db:para: Qt3DCore::QCameraLens specifies the projection matrix that will be used to define a Camera for a 3D scene.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: float QCameraLens::aspectRatio() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the projection's aspect ratio.

db:note.db:para: : The return value may be undefined if the projection type is not Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: float QCameraLens::bottom() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the bottom window coordinate of the projection.

db:note.db:para: The return value may be undefined if the projection type is Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: float QCameraLens::farPlane() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the projection's far plane.

db:section.db:title: float QCameraLens::fieldOfView() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the projection's field of view in degrees.

db:note.db:para: : The return value may be undefined if the projection type is not Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: float QCameraLens::left() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the lower left window coordinate of the projection.

db:note.db:para: The return value may be undefined if the projection type is Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: float QCameraLens::nearPlane() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the projection's near plane.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix4x4 QCameraLens::projectionMatrix() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the projection matrix.

db:section.db:title: Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::ProjectionType QCameraLens::projectionType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the lens' projection type.

db:section.db:title: float QCameraLens::right() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the upper right window coordinate of the projection.

db:note.db:para: The return value may be undefined if the projection type is Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setAspectRatio(float aspectRatio)
db:section.db:para: Sets the projection's aspect ratio to aspectRatio. This triggers a projection matrix update.

db:note.db:para: this has no effect if the projection type is not Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setBottom(float bottom)
db:section.db:para: Sets the projection's bottom window coordinate to bottom. This triggers a projection matrix update.

db:note.db:para: this has no effect if the projection type is Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setFarPlane(float farPlane)
db:section.db:para: Sets the projection's far plane to farPlane. This triggers a projection matrix update.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setFieldOfView(float fieldOfView)
db:section.db:para: Sets the projection's field of view to fieldOfView degrees. This triggers a projection matrix update.

db:note.db:para: this has no effect if the projection type is not Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setFrustumProjection(float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float nearPlane, float farPlane)
db:section.db:para: Defines an orthographic projection based on left, right, bottom, top, nearPlane, farPlane.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setLeft(float left)
db:section.db:para: Sets the projection's lower left window coordinate to left. This triggers a projection matrix update.

db:note.db:para: this has no effect if the projection type is Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setNearPlane(float nearPlane)
db:section.db:para: Sets the projection's near plane to nearPlane. This triggers a projection matrix update.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setOrthographicProjection(float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float nearPlane, float farPlane)
db:section.db:para: Defines an orthographic projection based on left, right, bottom, top, nearPlane, farPlane.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setPerspectiveProjection(float fieldOfView, float aspectRatio, float nearPlane, float farPlane)
db:section.db:para: Defines a perspective projection based on fieldOfView, aspectRatio, nearPlane, farPlane.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setProjectionType(Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::ProjectionType projectionType)
db:section.db:para: Sets the lens' projection type projectionType.

db:note.db:para: Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::Frustum and Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection are two different ways of specifying the same projection.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setRight(float right)
db:section.db:para: Sets the projection's upper right window coordinate to right. This triggers a projection matrix update.

db:note.db:para: this has no effect if the projection type is Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraLens::setTop(float top)
db:section.db:para: Sets the projection's top window coordinate to top. This triggers a projection matrix update.

db:note.db:para: this has no effect if the projection type is Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: float QCameraLens::top() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the bottom window coordinate of the projection.

db:note.db:para: The return value may be undefined if the projection type is Qt3DCore::QCameraLens::PerspectiveProjection.
